Title: Trumpet Evening Gown with Pearl Beaded Bodice

----

Sku: C1888

----

Bulkdiscount: 0

----

Sizes: 10, 14, 12, 4, 8, 6

----

Colors: red, royal, black

----

Category: formal-gowns

----

Featured-image: C1888-red-trumpet-evening-gown-with-pearl-beaded-bodice_p.jpg

----

Description: Excellent for any special occasions. This trumpet gown flows to the floor and has a slight train. Sweetheart neckline with a  sheer halter top overlay. The bodice is covered in a netting of pearls and jewels and extends to the sheer back and around the waistline.
